title: JJ Cole Luma™ Packable Carrier – 4-Position Baby Carrier – Leopard
features: 4-Position Baby Carrier: Lightweight and portable carrier is comfortable to wear and simple to use; the perfect alternative to a complicated baby wrap
Soft Comfort: A unique blend of breathable mesh and soft stretch jersey to keep everyone comfy
Adaptable Fit: Fits a wide range of parents with easy-to-adjust waist and shoulder straps
Portable Pocket: Packs down into its own pocket that fits right into the diaper bag
Adapts as Baby Grows: 4 different wearing options let you use this baby carrier from 8-35 pounds
description: JJ Cole’s Luma Packable Carrier makes getting around easy and comfortable for both you and your baby. Unlike a complicated baby wrap, this lightweight baby carrier features a super soft feel for additional comfort and is simple to use. It slips right on and adjusts easily with a one size fits most design that can easily be swapped between parents while you’re both out and about with baby. The fabric is a unique blend of breathable mesh and soft stretch jersey to keep you and baby comfortable. With four different wearing positions to choose from, you’ll be able to keep your baby close, and your hands free, in the way that works best for the two of you from newborn to toddler. When not in use, the Luma folds down into its own front pocket, making it easy to store or toss into the diaper bag when your family is on the go.
